actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend the title 39, United States Code, to provide that buildings constructed for use by the U.S. Postal Service shall be designed and constructed in a manner making them accessible to the physically handicapped.

summary.text: Applies to the United States Postal Service provisions requiring that buildings built, leased, or financed by the United States be designed and constructed to insure ready access to and use of such buildings by the physically handicapped.

titles.title: A bill to amend the title 39, United States Code, to provide that buildings constructed for use by the U.S. Postal Service shall be designed and constructed in a manner making them accessible to the physically handicapped.
